subject: Football (College)
Football
lead_paragraph: J. J. Watt has established himself as one of the top players in the N.F.L., and he could soon be joined in the league by his brothers T. J. and Derek, who play for Wisconsin.
snippet: J. J. Watt has established himself as one of the top players in the N.F.L., and he could soon be joined in the league by his brothers T. J. and Derek, who play for Wisconsin.
